snippet: A 10-episode series titled “TED Radio Hour” will begin on April 27 on NPR stations and at ted.npr.org, the two organizations plan to announce on Monday.
abstract: National Public Radio will debut a 10-episode series titled TED Radio Hour, which will feature talks from TED, the nonprofit group that sponsors conferences on ideas.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH JENSEN; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: A 10-episode series titled “TED Radio Hour” will begin on April 27 on NPR stations and at ted.npr.org, the two organizations plan to announce on Monday.
